Name: Phanpy Tag
LongDescription: Slightly raises Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Phanpy and Donphan.  You can get a Phanpy Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop if you offer a Phanpy Claw and a Phanpy Card. What will happen if you bring these three items together...?
